MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15am to safely carry out repairs to an underground fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:00am on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
